original_text: But when the plot came to the king’s attention, he issued written orders that the evil scheme Haman had devised against the Jews should come back onto his own head, and that he and his sons should be impaled on poles.
korean_text: 에스더가 왕 앞에 나아감으로 말미암아 왕이 조서를 내려 하만이 유다인을 해하려던 악한 꾀를 그의 머리에 돌려보내어 하만과 그의 여러 아들을 나무에 달게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: But when the plot came to the king's attention,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 계획이 왕의 주의를 끌었을 때,

sentences.original_text: that the evil scheme Haman had devised against the Jews
should come back onto his own head,
and that he and his sons should be impaled on poles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 아들들이 말뚝에 꿰어져야 한다는 것이었다.
